CustomField.description: The utilisation of the vehicle based on load and capacity at the time.
CustomField.formula: IF ((Vehicle__r.Capacity__c + Trailer_1__r.Capacity__c + Trailer_2__r.Capacity__c) > 0, Vehicle_Load__c / ( Vehicle__r.Capacity__c + Trailer_1__r.Capacity__c + Trailer_2__r.Capacity__c ), 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The utilisation of the vehicle based on load and capacity at the time
CustomField.label: Vehicle Utilisation
